p: S. sclarea EO was less effective, showing MIC and MBC values from 12.5% and 1.56%, and no activity was reported against P. fluorescens. The agar diffusion test revealed that the EO was active against A. bohemicus, K. marina and B. cereus with smaller IZ halos. On the contrary, the vapor phase test for S. sclarea revealed no activity for all bacterial strains.
